title: Airport & Travel
description: Useful English for navigating airports and travel situations.

sentences.english: Which gate is my flight to London departing from?
sentences.korean: 런던행 비행기는 몇 번 게이트에서 출발하나요?

sentences.english: I am so excited for this long vacation!
sentences.korean: 이번 긴 휴가가 정말 너무 기대돼요!
